channel.title: Cymbals Eat Guitars on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Cymbals Eat Guitars on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, September 2014
item.description: Album Digest September 2014 contains four amazing albums, including the long-awaited return from the Aphex Twin, and an album from Cymbals Eat Guitars released about a week after I wondered what had happened to them. Spooky. Rounding out the selection this month are a cool punky-disco album by The Juan Maclean and a truly remarkable offering by Vessel.
